text: has partnered with an incredible global client seeking a Team Software Engineering team to provide tools and services for building, managing, and running software on mobile devices within locations worldwide. The devices we develop software for are used in Fulfillment Centers, Middle and Last Mile facilities such as the smallest last-mile delivery stations in emerging markets to one million plus square foot robotic facilities in North America, Japan, and Europe. Their software solutions are relied upon by hundreds of thousands of associates at thousands of locations and are critical to the delivery of shipment.

p.4: They are a company excited about learning every day and delighting customers by solving problems that impact order fulfillment. We are passionate about software quality, repeatability, testability, and maintainability. When in need of clarity, they go to the product customers, perhaps a user, and talk to them until we get it right. Understanding the challenges associated with operating a large-scale system in production, and our designs and implementations reflect that understanding.
